Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Harlem/Lake
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Harlem/Lake due to track switching problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Harlem/Lake due to track switching problems.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
